name: Sajilo Taxi
description: A comprehensive booking platform for Sajilo Taxi, a Sikkim-based transport company. The customer app allows users to book shared or private cabs, select pickup/drop points, choose seats, and track their ride in real-time. The system is designed to support an admin panel for managing drivers and vehicles, and a dedicated app for drivers. Serving Sikkim, Darjeeling, Kalimpong, and Bhutan.
